GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
spi: Fix simplification of devm_spi_register_controller

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 445fb9c19cf45bd9472fd9babaa31c5e6c7d2720, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 59ebbe40fb51e307032ae7f63b2749fad2d4635a. For more details please see the references link.
